channel.title: Please help

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

I’m trying to add the rs2 gameframe…i need to know where to add this:

	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Report Abuse", 158, 461);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Report Abuse", 157, 460);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "All", 159, 33);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "All", 158, 32);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Game", 159, 91);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Game", 158, 90);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Public", 154, 148);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Public", 153, 147);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Private", 154, 205);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Private", 153, 204);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Trade", 154, 262);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Trade", 153, 261);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0x000000, "Duel", 154, 318);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(0xffffff, "Duel", 153, 317);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[publicChatMode], PChat[publicChatMode], 165, 147);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[publicChatMode], PChat[publicChatMode], 164, 146);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[privateChatMode], PChat[privateChatMode], 165, 204);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[privateChatMode], PChat[privateChatMode], 164, 203);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[tradeMode], PChat[tradeMode], 165, 261);//319
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[tradeMode], PChat[tradeMode], 164, 260);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor2[duelMode], PChat[duelMode], 165, 318);
	smallTextDrawingArea.drawText(PColor[duelMode], PChat[duelMode], 164, 317);

and how to make the gameframe!!

        -Thanks
